DOC.brief_summary: Upper gastrointestinal system endoscopy is widely used for diagnostic approach. To increase the tolerability and compliance of the patient, sedation is applied. There are many studies showing that sedation increases the patient compliance and the tolerability. However, spasmolytic use in GE has not been evaluated yet.
DOC.criteria: no hypersensitivity to the agent. Emergent cases,the cases with low mental compatibility and pregnant women were excluded from the study. Moreover, the procedures under sedation, cases with disorders decreasing the intestinal motility like hypothyroidism and diabetes were excluded.
